评论详情: Every time I wear these pants someone asks me where I got them! They’re the perfect print and fit. Love to style these with chunky sweaters or graphic tees. The waist is small/has no stretch, if you’re in between sizes, I recommend sizing up!
Im a medium normally but ordered a large based off their size chart and just had to return and order an XL! Quality is great tho and they style is so cute.
It fit in the hip area but several inches to small in the waist.

I purchased through Amazon however I cannot return to Amazon. I have to wait on the seller to send me a mailing address. These pants was huge on me and it took over a month to receive them and now I have to return them.

评论概述: Not true to size is too small
评论详情: The fit on this pants doesnt make sense. It is loose on the legs and hip but the waist is tiny. I usually run as a Large and just to be safe I ordered the XL and is way too small
So glad I saw influencer say size up!!!  They fit perfect.  Length was great for me in need of extra length.  Quality is exceptional for the price.  Color on point
I purchased through Amazon however I cannot return to Amazon.  I have to wait on someone to send me a mailing address and I assume will be required to pay postage.  Will not purchase from them again
